title: Tensei shitara Slime Datta Ken: Kanwa - Veldora Nikki
original_name: 転生したらスライムだった件 閑話
opening_song: "Meguru Mono (メグルモノ)" by Takuma Terashima
ending_song: "Little Soldier (リトルソルジャー)" by Azusa Tadokoro
sinopse: Ifrit, who has been trapped in Rimuru due to the latter's Predator skill, recaps events of the season while in a discussion with Veldora as they play Shogi.
